      Parameters:

    • getGame

      public Game getGame()
      Returns:
      the game which this object is referring

    • getTurnManager

      public PlayerTurnManager getTurnManager()
      Returns:
      the actual PlayerTurnManager of this round

    • setGameMustEnd

      public void setGameMustEnd()
      set the boolean attribute gameMustEnd as true to indicate that this is the last round of the game

    • updateOpponentsPathPosition

      public void updateOpponentsPathPosition​(PlayerDashboard player)
      Add a faith point to each player when a player discard resources from the market
      Parameters:
      player - the player that will be excluded from the path position update

    • calculatePoints

      public void calculatePoints​(PlayerDashboard p)
      Calculate and update the points of a given player
      Parameters:
      p - the player we want to calculate the total points scored

    • endGame

      public void endGame()
      Multiplayer: sort the list of player on the points they have. Soloplayer: either lorenzo wins or you get your total of points scored

    • nextRound

      public void nextRound​(boolean singlePlayerFirstRound)
      Upon being called, switch the PlayerTurnManager to the next player on the list of players
      Parameters:
      singlePlayerFirstRound - true if it's the single player's first round

    • isAnyoneConnected

      public boolean isAnyoneConnected()
      Returns:
      true if there's at least one player connected playing the game

    • wasPlaying

      public int wasPlaying​(java.lang.String nickName)
      Parameters:
      nickName - nickName of the player that is trying to reconnect
      Returns:
      true if this player was in Game

    • playerComeback

      public void playerComeback​(int playerPosition)
      Sets knowPlayer as playing
      Parameters:
      playerPosition - position of the player in the arraylist
